User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the YourbAIstyle application.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The user's role in the application.

Knowledge.title: Knowledge
Knowledge.description: Represents a piece of organizational knowledge (SOP, product knowledge, tacit knowledge).

id.description: Unique identifier for the knowledge entry.

type.description: Type of knowledge (e.g., SOP, product knowledge, tacit knowledge).

content.description: Content of the knowledge entry (e.g., text, link).

authorId.description: Reference to the User who created the knowledge entry. (Relationship: User 1:N Knowledge)

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the knowledge entry was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the knowledge entry was last updated.

ChatbotInteraction.title: Chatbot Interaction
ChatbotInteraction.description: Represents a stored question and answer interaction with the chatbot for reuse.

question.description: The question asked by the user.

answer.description: The final, approved answer provided by the chatbot.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the interaction was created.

definition.description: Stores user profiles, including their role. Path-based ownership ensures only the user can read their own profile, but role changes are restricted.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user, matching their Firebase Authentication UID.

definition.description: Stores all knowledge entries. Read-only for all authenticated users, but only writable by Admins.

params.name: knowledgeId
params.description: The unique ID of the knowledge document.

definition.description: Stores approved question-answer pairs for the chatbot's 'Quick Question' mode. Readable by all, creatable by all, but only updatable/deletable by Admins.

params.name: interactionId
params.description: The unique ID for the chatbot interaction.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore structure is designed to support the YourbAIstyle application, focusing on secure, role-based access control. User profiles with roles are stored in a top-level 'users' collection. A global 'knowledge' collection is readable by all but only writable by admins. A global 'chatbotInteractions' collection stores curated Q&A pairs for quick reuse, is readable by all, creatable by all, but updatable/deletable only by Admins.
